verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w be|strong="H7892"\w* not silent; \w be|strong="H7892"\w* not speechless;\f + \fr 83:1 \ft Or deaf\f* \w be|strong="H7892"\w* not still, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God.
See how Your enemies rage, how Your foes have reared their heads.

\w With|strong="H7218"\w* cunning \w they|strong="H3588"\w* scheme \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w Your|strong="H5375"\w* people \w and|strong="H7218"\w* conspire \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w those|strong="H5375"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* cherish,

saying, “\w Come|strong="H5971"\w*, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* erase \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w*; \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* remembered no \w more|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w mind|strong="H2142"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* plot together, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* form \w an|strong="H3478"\w* alliance \w against|strong="H3212"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w*—

\w the|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Edom \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Ishmaelites, \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Moab \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Hagrites,
\w of|strong="H4124"\w* Gebal, Ammon, \w and|strong="H4124"\w* Amalek, \w of|strong="H4124"\w* Philistia with the people \w of|strong="H4124"\w* Tyre.
Even Assyria \w has|strong="H5973"\w* joined \w them|strong="H3427"\w*, lending strength \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Lot. Selah

Do \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w did|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Midian, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Sisera \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jabin \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* River Kishon,
\w who|strong="H1992"\w* perished \w at|strong="H6213"\w* Endor \w and|strong="H6213"\w* became \w like|strong="H6213"\w* dung \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ground.

Make \w their|strong="H1961"\w* nobles \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Oreb \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zeeb, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* all \w their|strong="H1961"\w* princes \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Zebah \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zalmunna,
\w who|strong="H3605"\w* said, “Let us possess \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ourselves \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pastures \w of|strong="H3605"\w* God.”
Make \w them|strong="H3423"\w* like tumbleweed, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3423"\w* God, like chaff before \w the|strong="H3423"\w* wind.
\w As|strong="H6440"\w* fire consumes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* forest, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flame \w sets|strong="H7896"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains ablaze,
so pursue \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* Your tempest, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* terrify \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* Your storm.

Cover \w their|strong="H3651"\w* faces \w with|strong="H3651"\w* shame, \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* may seek \w Your|strong="H7291"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ever ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* terrified; \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* perish \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H7036"\w*.

May \w they|strong="H5704"\w* know \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* alone, whose name is \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, are Most High \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.
